DESCRIPTION: Skip forward a number of turns. Your powers and cards trigger, but block and enemies are unchanged. You do not replenish Energy or discard/draw cards.
Foretold enemies take double damage when attacked, once each turn.
Counter is reduced by 1 at the end of turn, wherever it is. When the last counter is removed, #yExhaust.
Consume duration of turn-based debuffs (leftmost first) on the enemy for an additional effect.
Draw a card, then discard it unless it meets the condition. Repeat until you find the right amount or empty your draw pile.
Return from your discard pile to your hand.
You can use HP to play this card if you don't have enough energy. If you do, it #yExhausts.
